pages.text: The $(item)Soul Powder$() is an essential rite material for the $(l:souls/entry_identification#recipe_light)$(marked)Rite of Enlightenent's Sighing$(), as it is the first source of $(marked)Soul Energy$() one may get. $(br)In order to fabricate it, one will need to create a $(item)Dead Soul$(), $(item)Astral Body Matter$() and $(item)Soul and Magan Essence$().
The dead soul is simply created with the chaos rite on $(item)Soul Essence$().
Astral Body Matter is the chaotic equivalent of $(item)Stardust$().
$(o)Not to be confused with Soul Sand$()
